name: overdramatize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a situation seem a lot more exciting, important, or dangerous than it really is: He always tends to overdramatize everything. The story is dramatic enough, so you don't have to over-dramatize it. Of course it's easy to overdramatise.
More examplesFewer examplesI don't want to overdramatize it, but it is a life or death situation.She didn't try to over-dramatize.You do overdramatise things a bit, you know.
